All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddCustomerHandler
This class adds a new customer.
Address
This class creates an address object.
BasketHandler
This is a basket handler class object to add items to basket.
BasketViewHandler
This a basket view object to display basket items and value.
CheckOutHandler
This class process checkout by resetting the basket and display confirmation.
ClearBasketHandler
This class object reset the basket by removing all items from the basket.
CustEditFormHandler
This class impletments http request to process the edit input to edit the customer object using web interface.
Customer
This class creates a customer object.
CustomerDAO
This is a data access object that creates a connection with customers data in the database.
CustomerFormProcessHandler
This class process the input of the new customer's form data and put it in the database.
CustomerMenuConsole
This is the customer menu console to add, view, delete, edit the customer.
CustomersHandler
This class creates a webpage for displaying all customers.
DeleteCustomerHandler
This class deletes a customer and refreshes the page.
DeleteHandler
This class creates an object to delete a product by its id.
EachCustomerHandler
This class display the information of the each customer.
EditCustomerHandler
This class create a form for editing the customer's information.
EditFormHandler
This is an object that updates product information.
EditHandler
This class create a form to edit the product.
ExpiryHandler
This class filters the stock by its expiry level and display them
FilterHandler
This class filters the products by their category and display them on web.
FoodItem
This is an object for the stock level in the store.
FoodItemDOA
This class creates a DAO for the stock level of Food items.
FoodProduct
This is a Food Product object class.
FoodProductConsole
This class creates a console to select the menu options to view products list, search, delete, add and update a product.
FoodProductDAO
This is a DAO class that builds connection with the database to make queries.
FormProcessHandler
This class adds the new customers data to the database.
InputProductHandler
This class returns a webpage for the product input form to add a new item.
LoginFormHandler
This class process a log-in request by the users and give them access after checking the password by hashing.
LoginHandler
This class creates an input form for the login interface.
LogoutHandler
This class setup a log-in session and redirect the page to the home page after completing the request.
Main
This the main class to manage the food store.
MenuConsole
This class creates a console to select the menu options to view products list, search, delete, add and update a product.
ProductHandler
This class creates a display for a single food product.
RootHandler
This class implements Http Handler to process a request to display the home page.
SearchHandler
This class object searches the products.
SessionManager
This class creates a session manager for current logged-in user.
ShoppingBasket
This class creates a shopping basket object.
ShoppingBasketDAO
This class is a data access object to build a connection with database.
StockHandler
This is an Stock Object class that displays stock details to admin users.
TestCustomer
This class tests the Data Access Object of the Customer class.
TestFoodProduct
This class tests the Data Access Object of the Food Product class.
TestWebServer
This class tests different paths at http server using JUnit and mockito.
User
This class creates a user object.
UserDAO
This class creates connection with database for a user.
Util
This class create simple utility methods to convert different string formats to get data.
